channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] Bare Metal Servers for VPC (is.bare-metal-server) has removed the plan named mz2d-metal-16x512
[updated] Bare Metal Servers for VPC (is.bare-metal-server) has removed the plan named mz2d-metal-2x64
[updated] Key Protect (kms) has a new plan named sat-pricing
item.description: IBM Cloud Key Protect Satellite service hosted on user-owned resources. The service has a base price for installing Key Protect in the Satellite location plus a linear charge for the requested quota of keys in all of the instances in that location. If the quota is changed mid-month, you are charged based on the maximum quota set that month. Please refer to documentation for resource and usage requirements, terms, and conditions.
